authors.name: Paul Charlton
authors.affiliation: Procurador General de los EE.UU. para el estado de Arizona

title: Tip Sheet 3012: Historias Que Nos Perdemos En La Frontera
description: Moderated by Dennis Wagner, this panel discussion features Paul Charlton, David Gonzales, and Sandalio Gonzalez sharing their insights on the challenges and risks of reporting on the U.S.-Mexico border, including the importance of understanding the complexities of the border and the need for more in-depth coverage of immigration issues.
